name: Sou-ko-ban Pocket Edition
overview: The amazing classic puzzle game, Soukoban, is back, with a lot of levels and improvements. Your goal is simple: move the boxes in order to put them in the correct place. This concept is the base of this mind-blowing puzzle game, created 21 years ago by Hiroyuki Imabayashi. Now you can experience again the magic of this game in this revisited version that KAROSHI CORP. brings to you. Can you clear all stages?
